name: Tuca
description:
In "Tuca", you control a dog who needs to prevent enemies from  stealing her food. The game takes place in a 2D environment, where the dog's food is in the center of the screen and enemies come from the sides and try to reach the center.

The player's objective is to prevent the enemies from reaching the food, defeating them before they reach the center of the screen. The dog has the ability to bark, crouch and jump to prevent enemies from reaching his food.
